mapper.select: SELECT i.StoreID as StoreID, i.ReceiptID as ReceiptID, i.GoodsID as GoodsID, SUM (i.RecQty) AS qty FROM Items i right JOIN ( SELECT StoreID, ReceiptID FROM Manifest WHERE OrdDate >= #{items.OrdDate} GROUP BY StoreID, ReceiptID ) b ON b.StoreID = i.StoreID AND b.ReceiptID = i.ReceiptID where i.StoreID !='' GROUP BY i.StoreID, i.ReceiptID, i.GoodsID ORDER BY qty desc

SELECT i.StoreID, s.StoreName as StoreName, i.GoodsID, left(g.KindCode,2) as KindCode, g.BarCode as BarCode, left(g.Name,8) as Name, g.Price as Price, sum(i.RecQty) as RecQty, sum(i.RecQty*i.BuyPrice) as CBAmount FROM Items i, Manifest m, Stores s, Goods g, Stock st WHERE s.StoreID = i.StoreID and st.StoreID = i.StoreID and st.GoodsID = i.GoodsID and st.Quantity >0 AND i.StoreID = m.StoreID AND i.ReceiptID = m.ReceiptID AND s.Type = 1 AND m.RecCheckDate = #{items.date} AND m.Amount >= 0 AND i.GoodsID = g.GoodsID AND i.RecQty > 0 GROUP BY i.StoreID, s.StoreName , i.GoodsID, g.Name , g.KindCode, g.BarCode,g.Price ORDER BY i.StoreID asc ,G.KindCode asc ,CBAmount desc
